1423670.name: Autopanic Zero
1423670.description:
Live, then Autopanic.

What is Autopanic Zero?

Autopanic Zero is a minimalist twinstick shooter survival game with deep customizability to multiple playstyle. Designed with quick sessions in mind. 

The balance is carefully crafted to be quite challenging which might not suit everyone, but completely beatable even with the starting gear.

What isn't Autopanic Zero?

  • This is not really a Vampire Survival-like. At least I don't think so.

  • This is not an auto battler, you can try to play like one but it's not really balanced around it.

Features

  • A variety of abilities and weapons for you to combine and dominate the fast-paced combat.

  • Carefully balanced gameplay that will greatly challenge your shooting skills as much as your overall strategizing.

  • Quick ten minute loop for a more busy age.

  • Minimalist visual style.

  • Tons of unlockable parts to customize your gameplay.

  • Created by one person.
1423670.supported_languages: 英语, 繁体中文, 日语
